name: Chicken Curry
preparation: 1. Cut the chicken into small pieces. 2. Chop the onion and garlic. 3. Heat oil in a pan and cook the onion and garlic until soft. 4. Add the chicken and spices and cook until browned. 5. Add water and simmer for 15 minutes. 6. Serve with cooked rice.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
preparation: 1. Cook spaghetti in salted water. 2. Fry bacon until crispy. 3. Beat eggs with cheese and pepper. 4. Mix pasta with bacon and egg mixture quickly. 5. Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
preparation: 1. Wash and cut vegetables. 2. Heat oil in a wok. 3. Cook vegetables on high heat. 4. Add soy sauce and stir. 5. Serve hot.

name: Beef Stew
preparation: 1. Cut beef into chunks. 2. Chop vegetables. 3. Brown beef in a pot. 4. Add vegetables and broth. 5. Simmer for 45 minutes until tender.

name: Caesar Salad
preparation: 1. Wash lettuce. 2. Grill chicken and slice it. 3. Combine lettuce, chicken, cheese and croutons. 4. Add sauce and mix well.

name: Grilled Salmon
preparation: 1. Season salmon. 2. Heat grill or pan. 3. Cook salmon 4 minutes per side. 4. Add lemon juice before serving.

name: Tomato Soup
preparation: 1. Chop onion and garlic. 2. Cook until soft. 3. Add tomatoes and broth. 4. Simmer 20 minutes. 5. Blend until smooth.

name: Pancakes
preparation: 1. Mix ingredients in a bowl. 2. Heat pan. 3. Pour batter. 4. Cook until golden on both sides.

name: Omelette
preparation: 1. Beat eggs with salt. 2. Heat oil. 3. Cook eggs until set. 4. Fold and serve.

name: Pizza Margherita
preparation: 1. Preheat oven. 2. Spread tomato on dough. 3. Add cheese. 4. Bake 20 minutes. 5. Add basil.

name: Avocado Toast
preparation: 1. Toast bread. 2. Mash avocado with salt. 3. Spread on toast. 4. Add olive oil.

name: Chicken Wrap
preparation: 1. Cook chicken. 2. Warm tortilla. 3. Add chicken and lettuce. 4. Roll and serve.

name: Rice with Vegetables
preparation: 1. Cook rice. 2. Fry vegetables. 3. Mix with rice. 4. Season and serve.

name: Chicken Pasta
preparation: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Cook chicken. 3. Add cream and cheese. 4. Mix with pasta.

name: Fruit Salad
preparation: 1. Wash fruit. 2. Cut into pieces. 3. Mix and serve fresh.

name: Hamburger
preparation: 1. Shape beef patty. 2. Grill patty. 3. Toast bun. 4. Assemble burger.

name: Chicken Soup
preparation: 1. Boil broth. 2. Add chicken and vegetables. 3. Simmer 25 minutes.

name: Fried Rice
preparation: 1. Fry egg. 2. Add rice. 3. Add soy sauce. 4. Stir well.

name: Baked Potatoes
preparation: 1. Preheat oven. 2. Cut potatoes. 3. Season. 4. Bake 35 minutes.

name: Tuna Salad
preparation: 1. Drain tuna. 2. Chop vegetables. 3. Mix and season.

name: French Toast
preparation: 1. Mix egg and milk. 2. Dip bread. 3. Fry until golden.

name: Chicken Nuggets
preparation: 1. Cut chicken. 2. Coat with breadcrumbs. 3. Fry until crispy.

name: Pasta Salad
preparation: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Chop tomato. 3. Mix and season.

name: Scrambled Eggs
preparation: 1. Beat eggs. 2. Melt butter. 3. Cook eggs slowly.

name: Veggie Wrap
preparation: 1. Cook vegetables. 2. Warm tortilla. 3. Fill and roll.

name: Chicken Rice Bowl
preparation: 1. Cook rice. 2. Cook chicken. 3. Combine in bowl.

name: Grilled Cheese
preparation: 1. Butter bread. 2. Add cheese. 3. Grill until melted.

name: Pasta Bolognese
preparation: 1. Cook meat. 2. Add tomato sauce. 3. Cook pasta. 4. Mix.

name: Chicken Salad
preparation: 1. Cook chicken. 2. Chop lettuce. 3. Mix and serve.

name: Smoothie
preparation: 1. Add all ingredients to blender. 2. Blend until smooth.

name: Chicken Tacos
preparation: 1. Cook chicken. 2. Warm tortillas. 3. Fill and serve.

name: Rice Omelette
preparation: 1. Mix rice with egg. 2. Cook in pan until set.

name: Baked Chicken
preparation: 1. Preheat oven. 2. Season chicken. 3. Bake 40 minutes.

name: Yogurt Bowl
preparation: 1. Add yogurt to bowl. 2. Add fruit on top.

name: Vegetable Soup
preparation: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. Boil in broth 25 minutes.

name: Chicken Sandwich
preparation: 1. Cook chicken. 2. Toast bread. 3. Assemble sandwich.

name: Rice with Egg
preparation: 1. Cook rice. 2. Fry egg. 3. Serve together.

name: Pasta with Cheese
preparation: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Add cheese. 3. Mix well.

name: Banana Pancakes
preparation: 1. Mash banana. 2. Mix with egg and flour. 3. Cook pancakes.

name: Chicken Pasta Salad
preparation: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Cook chicken. 3. Mix with vegetables.

name: Egg Sandwich
preparation: 1. Fry egg. 2. Toast bread. 3. Assemble sandwich.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
preparation: 1. Cook chicken. 2. Add rice. 3. Add soy sauce.

name: Vegetable Pasta
preparation: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Cook vegetables. 3. Mix together.

name: Apple Oatmeal
preparation: 1. Cook oats with milk. 2. Add chopped apple.

name: Chicken Quesadilla
preparation: 1. Fill tortilla with chicken and cheese. 2. Grill until melted.

name: Rice Salad
preparation: 1. Cook rice. 2. Add vegetables. 3. Mix well.

name: Chicken with Vegetables
preparation: 1. Cook chicken. 2. Add vegetables. 3. Cook until tender.

name: Toast with Jam
preparation: 1. Toast bread. 2. Spread jam.

name: Chicken Soup with Noodles
preparation: 1. Boil broth. 2. Add chicken. 3. Add noodles and cook.

name: Vegetable Omelette
preparation: 1. Beat eggs. 2. Add vegetables. 3. Cook in pan.
